title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Join Our Friends
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends         A Junior Ranger proudly displays her completed junior ranger booklet. NPS photo  If you would like to contribute to the education programs offered at the park consider joining The Friends of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial (The Perry Group). The Perry Group is an organization established to support programs at Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial.  Since 1989, the Perry Group has organized and promoted various activities such as visits from the US Brig Niagara (a replica of the winning flagship in the Battle of Lake Erie) which was available for tours and lectures. Other events have included sponsorship of the annual Toledo Orchestra for Historic Weekend, the Junior Ranger Jamboree, the Mayfly Festival, the Naturalization Ceremony and many other events and programs. For more information visit www.theperrygroup.org.    You may contact The Perry Group at: P.O. Box 484 Put-in-Bay, Ohio 43456
